description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Libarchive remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-20697), it is crucial to apply the relevant updates provided by Microsoft.

1. Download and apply the KB5034123 update for Windows 11 Version 23H2 or the respective KB5034130 update for Windows 11 for x64-based Systems.

2. Check the system build number to confirm compatibility:
   - Windows 11 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.25398.643
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.22631.3007
   - Windows 11 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.22621.3007

3. Restart your system after the installation to ensure all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update mitigates the impact of the identified vulnerability that allows remote code execution under certain conditions.
- For manual installation or further information, visit the official update catalog at: 
  - [KB5034130](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034130) 
  - [KB5034123](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034123).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is compatible with the updates specified.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
